title: Colorful Eggs
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 10L
description: In Colorful Eggs, readers follow a young boy as he seeks brightly colored eggs hidden around his home. Detailed, colorful illustrations, high-frequency words, and simple sentence patterns support students. Use this book to discuss the popular tradition of dying and hunting eggs while also teaching students about identifying main idea and details and using capital letters and periods.
reviewWords: blue, colorful, egg, green, orange, pink, purple, red, yellow
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /p/ sound
grammar: Capitalization and Punctuation                : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings
wordWork: Concept Words                : Describe objects using color words
